name: RODA - Razmisli pa Klikni ide u Vrtic
name_original: RODA - Razmisli pa Klikni ide u Vrtic
description:
Razmisli pa Klikni (Think then Click) is a program about computer safety for children that brings you this fun and educational application. Play games with your children or enjoy a few interactive animated picture books and teach them how to react when unexpected things appear on screen and in games.

Aimed primarily at 4 - 7 year old children.
